newsitem.title: JAPAN: Showa Aluminum shares up on firm earnings.
newsitem.headline: Showa Aluminum shares up on firm earnings.

text.p: Shares in Showa Aluminum Corp were higher on Thursday morning, reflecting strong earnings for the interim period announced the day before, brokers said.
At 0141 GMT, the shares were 12 yen higher at 622 yen in turnover of 1.292 million shares.
On Wednesday, the aluminium processor said that its parent current profit for the six months to September 30, 1996, was 3.37 billion yen versus 1.71 billion yen in the previous year.
